title: Song-a-Week 2019
description: I made a song every week in 2019. Here are some of my favorites.

title: The Dragon Emperor & His Largest Army
description: The Dragon Emperor & His Largest Army's self-titled album tells the story of the Dragon Emperor, a cosmic trickster whose goal is to conquer worlds and transform populations into mindless soldiers. It consists of ten vignettes, each telling a different story about the Dragon Emperorâ€™s journey--and the devastation wrought on the planets in his path.

title: CURI/OSITY
description: CURI/OSITY is a post-apocalyptic tale about human hubris and robotic nonconformity.

title: HUMANe
description: HUMANe is something we conceived and produced in one afternoon in 11th grade. It portrays the lives of a herd of animals and the humans who hunt them.
